spec_data.Name: perl-Module-Install-Contributors
spec_data.License: (GPL+ or Artistic) and CC-BY-SA and Public Domain
spec_data.Description:
This is a plugin for Module::Install. It adds an x_contributors section to
your META.yml file. This is an array of strings, which should normally be in
"Name <email>" format, that is passed to contributors() function in
a Makefile.PL.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:20:55 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Add an x_contributors section to your META.yml
